column5: I want to thank our very own Santa for making my Christmas quite a bit merrier. I'm not accustomed to being in the position I am now, so the generosity shown by a particular member left me quite astounded. It is very heartwarming to know we have such decent and caring people here. Thank you so much and Merry Christmas!!!
There's good folks on this board Rick, nice to hear one was specially nice to you.  And I can probably guess who & what  for.......
I'm really glad to hear your Christmas has turned around for you Rick!!! Nothing sucks worse than being depressed at this time of year.  There is a bunch of very special people on this board!
If anyone has earned it...Glad to hear that your day has brightened up.  We do have a real community here.
Wow..Rick..am I assuming this has to do with your dog?  Glad to hear things are looking up.
The Lord works in mysterious ways,bro!
Glad things are looking better rick !!!! there still great people around,and you deserve it ,best wishes to jack,and a get well,cheer ...well he will be just fine,merry christmas rick.
Merry Christmas Rick, glad things are looking a little brighter !
No surprise to me...I always knew there was a Santa  Glad to hear things are a little brighter for you Rick!  Maureen
Just goes to show the quality of the people we have here, that really warms my heart to here everythings going to be o.k for ya! God bless ya santa  and everyone have a merry christmas!!!

I also have a pretty good idea who Santa might be and although I have yet to meet him face to face I know there are few as thoughtful as him, and just as few as deserving as you. I know you were the second OFNer I ever met and after 10 minutes of meeting you you gave me a brand new lure because I couldn't find one at the tackle shops. What comes around always goes around. Nice to see.
im so glad to hear!  That is great news!
